title: olesg13
author: olesg13
content: Hi! i currently own the algorythm used by novibet in order to create their market on sports... odds creation and modificatin according to the game events... the tool u need to have if u are opening a sports betting site...Patent is submitted already. Looking for a fair price offer.PS please take your time and examine the market accordingly for such a tool and its price and make the offer  thanks
